metadata.title: CVE-2020-10177 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Pillow before 7.1.0 has multiple out-of-bounds reads inlibImaging/FliDecode.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10177` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3').
